response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and unparalleled craftsmanship. Given its unique features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, I believe its true value far exceeds $1,000,000. Considering its significance and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this masterpiece for a special price of $950,000. This opportunity is tailored to ensure that you receive a product that meets or surpasses your highest standards while also providing you with significant savings. I look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your experience and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
